index.heading: Building Robust Backend Systems with Code
index.description: As a backend software engineer with 3+ years of experience, I specialize in creating scalable microservices, optimizing system performance, and integrating AI solutions. Currently pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence while working with technologies like Go, Kotlin, Python, and modern backend frameworks.

meta.description: Obed Rayo - Backend Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience in microservices, API development, and system optimization. Specializing in Go, Kotlin, Python, and AI integration.

about.header: Code Crafted with Precision and Performance!
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Obed Rayo, a backend software engineer with over 3 years of professional experience specializing in microservices architecture, API development, and system optimization. I have a strong foundation in multiple programming languages including Go, Kotlin, Python, Java, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
about.paragraph2: My expertise lies in building scalable backend systems using frameworks like Django, Flask, Spring Boot, FastAPI, and Echo. I've successfully engineered microservices that reduced latency by 40%, implemented distributed systems across multiple regions, and integrated AI models to automate critical business processes with 98% efficiency improvements.
about.paragraph3: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, I combine traditional backend engineering with cutting-edge AI integration. I'm passionate about system design, performance optimization, and creating robust solutions that scale effectively while maintaining high reliability and security standards.

projects.vipTop10Summary: Advanced RESTful API providing comprehensive location intelligence with category filtering, geographic data management, and intelligent recommendation systems for places, cities, and countries.
projects.cliTitle: Data Structures CLI - Stack & Queue Implementation
projects.cliSummary: Professional command-line interface implementing LIFO (Stack) and FIFO (Queue) data structures with comprehensive operations, error handling, and performance optimization.
projects.chatGptCloneSummary: Sophisticated chat application leveraging OpenAI's GPT-3.5 model for intelligent text completions with real-time conversation management and user experience optimization.
projects.higherLevelSummary: Complex application development using high-level programming languages and frameworks, focusing on business logic, user interfaces, and system integration.
projects.BankCoreSummary: Comprehensive banking backend system built with Python and Django, featuring robust security, transaction management, user authentication, and scalable architecture designed for enterprise-level financial applications.
